text: Came to PP branch & staff Celine Ho is very prompt & efficient to attend while we are in queue! Her knowledge of products are extensive & very patience & friendly! She brought out the best of RHB compared to other banks

My wife and I were just passing by RHB PP branch. With excellent customer service by Celine Ho we have become RHB premier customers. Our RM Bernard Chan served us well and professionally, explain clearly on our investments and extremely patient with us. An great asset to the bank! Well done üëç

Visited RHB Parkway before cny. The queue was very fast, almost no waiting and the service is very attentive, sincere n helpful! As compared to other banks waiting time during this festive season time , i am very impressed with RHB PW. Will highly recommend to anyone. Thanks for the hassle free n warm service!

Outstanding customer service by Jevon (the bald handsome officer). He helped my wife, conversed and entertained my kids and all with a happy, smiling awesome attitude. The best banking experience. Examplery customer service !

The RHB parkway branch bank officers will understand your needs and recommend suitable products. They give high interest for your savings and low interest for your loan. This is a good example of making money working hard for you
